import React from 'react' export default class PerformSaleComponent extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { itemType: '', brand: '', itemModel: '', processor: '', ramSize: '', hddSize: '', quantity: '', unitPrice: '', generation: '', cart: [], laptopBrandVisibility: 'hidden' } this.handleChangeLaptop = this.handleChangeLaptop.bind(this); } handleChangeLaptop = (evt) => { const value = evt.target.value; const name = evt.target.name; this.setState({ ...this.state, [name]: value, }); return
Model:
// console.log(this.state) } render() { return
